page.title: 14A DAY IN THE LIFE OF DAVID
page.content: My day begins at{7.30am}when I am wakened by my alarm clock. I go to the bathroom, wash myself and clean my teeth. Then I go back to my bedroom where I dress for school. After{breakfast,}I let out the geese. By this time, daddy is ready to drive me to{school}which is 2 miles away. During the morning break and at {lunchtime,}I play football with my friends. Mummy collects me at{3pm,}and when I arrive home, I change my clothes. I might ride down to the lake and spend an hour there. After{dinner}I go down the fields with my daddy and bring in the cows for milking. Around{7pm}I do my homework, then watch television and go to bed about{9.30pm.}
